calloutTemplateDialog.typeReadonly: Once a $t(common.template) is created, its type cannot be changed. If you need a different type, please create a new $t(common.template).

shareSettings.description: Based on the $t(common.settings) of the $t(common.space) that this {{elementName}} is in, you can edit with multiple users at once. If you do not want others to edit, change the $t(common.settings) below.
shareSettings.disabled: Based on the $t(common.settings) of the $t(common.space) that this {{elementName}}  is in, real-time collaboration is not enabled. This means that only one user can edit at a time.

options.CONTRIBUTORS: Everyone who can contribute in this $t(common.spaceSubspace)
options.ADMINS: The owner and the $t(common.admins) and $t(common.leads) of this $t(common.spaceSubspace)

searchScope.alternativeScope: Didn’t find what you were looking for? Try searching in:

spaceUnauthorizedDialog.message: This is a private $t(common.community) and most of it’s content is restricted to $t(common.members) only. If you want to join, <apply>click here to apply.</apply>

dashboardNavigation.privateSubspace: This is a private $t(common.subspace). Visit the $t(common.subspace) and apply to become a $t(common.member) to view it's content.

stateEditor.invalidChars: A phase name cannot contain special characters.
stateEditor.noRepeatedStates: A phase with the same name already exists.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Phase?
deleteDialog.activeStateWarning: This phase is currently the active one and cannot be deleted. You can always rename it or select another one as the active.

confirmationDialog.title: Be careful when changing the flow!
confirmationDialog.description:
- By changing the $t(common.innovation-flow), **all changes made to the current flow will be lost**.
- All existing collaboration tools will be grouped under the first phase of the new flow.

importCalloutsDialog.title: Apply New $t(common.template)
importCalloutsDialog.description:
You are about to apply a new $t(common.template). This action will permanently delete your current $t(common.innovation-flow). However, the existing collaboration tools linked to different phases will remain and be grouped under the first phase of the new setup.

Please choose one of the following options:
importCalloutsDialog.yesDescription: This will include the new collaboration tools from the $t(common.template) in addition to your existing ones.
importCalloutsDialog.noDescription: This will replace only the $t(common.innovation-flow), keeping your current collaboration tools as they are.

delete-comment.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete this $t(common.comment)?

toolbar.image.dropFileText: Drop the file or click to upload
toolbar.link.linkTargetOption: Abrir enlace en una nueva ventana

validation.maxLength: The resulting text goes beyond the size accepted by the server.

embed.invalidOrUnsupportedEmbed: Unfortunately, this code is either not valid or not supported. Please check the code carefully or contact support@alkem.io

confirmation-dialog.title: Abandonar organización
confirmation-dialog.text: Are you sure you want to leave? You might not be able to see the content or make contributions once you're not a $t(common.member) anymore.

activity-log-section.title: Participaciones recientes
activity-log-section.activity-sign-in-error-message: Para ver las contribuciones recientes, por favor inicia sesión.
activity-log-section.activity-join-error-message: To see the recent contributions, please join if you are not yet a $t(common.member) of this {{spaceLevel}}.
activity-log-section.activity-sign-in-and-join-error-message: To see the recent contributions, please sign in and join if you are not yet a $t(common.member) of this {{spaceLevel}}.

innovationFlow.error: The definition was not able to be visualized

activity-tooltip.headline: ¡Alkemio esta creciendo! En total, la plataforma acoge ahora:

callout-creation.title: What do you want to ask your $t(common.community)?

info-step.title: Detalles
info-step.type-comments-help: Select $t(common.Comments) when you want people to answer in a simple text format, like a message board.
info-step.type-posts-help: Select $t(common.posts) when you want people to answer in a card format.
info-step.type-whiteboards-help: Select ‘$t(common.Whiteboards)’ when you want people to answer on a visual $t(common.whiteboard), allowing them to draw and use text.
info-step.unique-title-validation-text: Este título ya está en uso$t(common.callout)

template-step.title: $t(common.templates)
template-step.post-template-text: Add default text to the $t(common.posts), for example questions that you like people to answer.

closeDialog.title: Discard $t(common.post)
closeDialog.text: Are you sure you want to close this $t(common.post)? Unsaved changes will be lost.

type-step.title: The type of the additional context to add.
type-step.error: Error occurred while loading the types
type-step.label: $t(common.post) label
type-step.type-help-text-short: Please choose the $t(common.post) label that best matches the context you wish to share.

info-step.title: Details
info-step.tags-help-text: Add free form tags to help quickly convey the key information about the $t(common.post). Good tags also help make the $t(common.post) easier to find in searches.

create-step.title: Create
create-step.name: Name
create-step.explanation: By completing this step the $t(common.post) will be created and you will have the option to add visuals.

visuals-step.title: Visuals
visuals-step.headline: Congratulations, you have now successfully created an $t(common.post)!
visuals-step.explanation: To further personalize your $t(common.post), please consider adding visuals such as a Banner to the $t(common.post).
visuals-step.bottom-note: You will still have the possibility to change these visuals under the $t(common.settings) tab as well as adding attachments and a Banner for the $t(common.dashboard) card.

visual-upload.error: Error occurred while uploading the image
visual-upload.entityCreatedErrorUploading: The {{entity}} was created, but there was an error uploading some images. Please try again.

credential-share-request-dialog.title: Comparte tus credenciales verificadas
credential-share-request-dialog.content: Selecciona las credenciales que desea guardar en su cartera de Alkemio.

alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.title: Usuario Alkemio
alkemio-user-credential-offer-dialog.content: Esta credencial permite al titular demostrar que es un usuario verificado de Alkemio.

alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.title: Alkemio $t(common.community) $t(common.Member)
alkemio-community-member-credential-offe.content: This credential allows the holder to prove that they are a $t(common.member) of the specified $t(common.community) within Alkemio.

edit-members.no-available-members: No users available to add; please check $t(common.members) of containing $t(common.community)

acceptInvitation.full: You are invited to become a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.space), please click here to accept

joinSpaceFirst.full: To become a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.subspace), first become a $t(common.member) of the parent $t(common.space)

joinSubspaceFirst.full: To become a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.subspace), first become a $t(common.member) of the parent $t(common.subspace)

contactOpportunityLeads.full: Send a message to $t(common.subspace) $t(common.leads) to become a $t(common.member)
contactOpportunityLeads.short: Send a message to $t(common.subspace) $t(common.leads) to become a $t(common.member)

dialog-apply-parent.title: Apply to {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-apply-parent.body: To join '{{subspaceName}}' you must join '{{spaceName}}' $t(common.space) first. Please add the $t(common.subspace) you want to join in the $t(common.spaces)' application form.

dialog-parent-app-pending.title: Solicitud al contenedor pendiente
dialog-parent-app-pending.body: To join {{subspaceName}}' you must join '{{spaceName}}' $t(common.space) first. There is already an application pending for that '{{spaceName}}', so you can also submit a parallel application for '{{subspaceName}}'.

dialog-join-parent.title: Join {{parentCommunityName}}
dialog-join-parent.body: You can join this $t(common.community) without applying for a $t(common.membership), but first you have to join {{parentCommunityName}} and accept the terms and conditions there.

backdrop.private: Interested in reading more? Please sign in or join if you are not yet a $t(common.member) of this {{blockName}}!
backdrop.authentication: Por favor, inicia sesión para ver los detalles sobre {{blockName}}.
backdrop.login: Por favor, inicia sesión para ver {{blockName}}.

referenceSegment.title: Referencias
referenceSegment.description: Please keep in mind that all the files you attach here become publicly available. If you only want the $t(common.members) of this $t(common.space) to be able to access the files, attach it to a $t(common.post) or a $t(common.collection) of links on one of the member pages.
referenceSegment.url-helper-text: Keep in mind that all uploaded files become accessible to everyone with the link and can only be deleted by the Alkemio team. <terms>Click here</terms> for the terms and conditions.
referenceSegment.plaintext-helper-text: Click here for the terms and conditions. You can upload Word, PDF, Excel, or images up to 15 MB

file-upload.file-size-error: El tamaño del archivo excede el límite de {0} MB
file-upload.file-upload-success: El archivo se ha añadido correctamente

editSpaceForm.read-access: Allow read access for non-space $t(common.members) to $t(common.subspaces)
editSpaceForm.readOnly: If you want to change any of this information, please contact the Alkemio team here.

deleteEntity.title: Danger Zone
deleteEntity.description: Click here to delete this {{entity}}. Be careful, this action cannot be undone.

confirmDialog.title: Confirm {{entity}} Deletion
confirmDialog.description: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible. You can only delete a {{entity}} if there are no underlying $t(common.subspaces) associated with it. If there are any $t(common.subspaces) within this page, please delete them first (you can do so from the {{entity}} $t(common.settings) > $t(common.subspaces) page).
confirmDialog.descriptionShort: Are you certain you want to delete this {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible.
confirmDialog.descriptionShortWithName: Are you certain you want to delete {{entity}}? Keep in mind that this action is irreversible.
confirmDialog.checkbox: Please check this box if you are certain about deleting this {{entity}}

nameID.title: Identificador
nameID.placeholder: Identificador textual único, utilizado para las rutas URL. Atención: No puede ser modificado después de creado.

legalEntityName.name: Nombre de la entidad legal
legalEntityName.placeholder: Enter the legal name of this $t(common.organization)

errorBlock.message: Sorry, an error occurred while loading {{blockName}}.

user-selector.tooltip: Empezar a escribir para encontrar usuarios

communityUpdates.title: Let your $t(common.community) know what's next
communityUpdates.msg-not-empty: El mensaje no puede estar vacío

remove.confirmationContent: Removing a $t(common.community) update is an irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue?

engines.externalVCDescription: This $t(common.virtualContributor) utilizes {{engineName}}, an external AI engine. As a result, the Body of Knowledge is not accessible.

bodyOfKnowledge.title: Body of Knowledge
bodyOfKnowledge.privateBokTooltip: This Body of Knowledge is private
bodyOfKnowledge.spaceBokDescription: Answers {{vcName}} gives are based on the body of knowledge coming from:

contributions.title: Contribuciones
contributions.help: The $t(common.spaces) and $t(common.subspaces) that this $t(common.organization) is contributing to

discussion.cant-post: No puede responder en este debate

description.title: Comentar en este debate
description.placeholder: Añadir mas información sobre el debate aquí

tooltip.markdown-help:
You can add formatting to your $t(common.comment),
for example:
Bold text: **bold**
Italic text: *italic*
Header: ##Title
Link: [text](url)
tooltip.mentions: Escribe algunos caracteres para encontrar usuarios relevantes

vcInteractions.disclaimer: Create a new $t(common.comment) to interact with another VC.
vcInteractions.help: You can only interact with one $t(common.virtualContributor) per thread ($t(common.comment) + 'sub’comments). If you’d like to engage with another VC, start a new thread by creating a $t(common.comment) in the bottom input field.

description.title: Further information
description.placeholder: Add further information on the discussion here

discussions.no-data-create: No hay debates. Crea un nuevo debate
discussions.no-data-join: No discussions. Please join the $t(common.community) to create a discussion

USER_SPACE_COMMUNITY_JOINED.subject: {{spaceName}} - Welcome to the $t(common.community)!
USER_SPACE_COMMUNITY_JOINED.description:
Thank you for joining {{spaceName}}!
You can now start contributing to the various $t(common.posts) and $t(common.whiteboards), further deepen your knowledge about this topic, and connect with other Contributors.

USER_SPACE_COMMUNITY_APPLICATION.subject: You have successfully applied to join {{spaceName}}

SPACE_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.subject: {{spaceName}} - New $t(common.post) is published "{{calloutName}}", have a look!
SPACE_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_PUBLISHED.description: {{triggeredByName}} published a new $t(common.post) in {{spaceLevel}}: {{spaceName}}, with name: {{calloutName}}.

SPACE_ADMIN_COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.subject: "{{memberName}}" joined {{spaceName}}
SPACE_ADMIN_COMMUNITY_NEW_MEMBER.description: {{memberName}} has joined {{spaceName}}, of which you are an $t(common.admin).

SPACE_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_CONTRIBUTION.subject: {{triggeredByName}} created a contribution in "{{calloutName}}"
SPACE_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_CONTRIBUTION.description: In {{spaceName}}, of which you are a member.

SPACE_ADMIN_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_CONTRI.subject: {{triggeredByName}} created a contribution in "{{calloutName}}"
SPACE_ADMIN_COLLABORATION_CALLOUT_CONTRI.description: In {{spaceName}}, of which you are an admin.

SPACE_ADMIN_COMMUNITY_APPLICATION.subject: {{triggeredByName}} applied to join {{spaceName}}

SPACE_LEAD_COMMUNICATION_MESSAGE.subject: As a lead of {{spaceName}}, you've received a message from {{triggeredByName}}

SPACE_COMMUNICATION_MESSAGE_SENDER.subject: You sent a message to the leads of {{spaceName}}

VIRTUAL_CONTRIBUTOR_ADMIN_SPACE_COMMUNIT.subject: {{triggeredByName}} has invited {{contributorName}} to {{spaceName}}, of which you're an admin

PLATFORM_FORUM_DISCUSSION_CREATED.subject: {{triggeredByName}} started a new discussion in the forum {{category}}

PLATFORM_FORUM_DISCUSSION_COMMENT.subject: {{triggeredByName}} commented on your forum post in {{discussionName}}

PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER_SIGNED_UP.subject: {{triggeredByName}} has signed up to the platform

PLATFORM_ADMIN_USER_PROFILE_CREATED.subject: {{triggeredByName}} has signed up to the platform

spaceWelcomeDialog.title: 🎉 Your $t(common.space) is Ready!
spaceWelcomeDialog.description:
Now, make it your own:
⚙ Set it up – Customize your structure and $t(common.settings).
📝 Add content - Create $t(common.whiteboards), $t(common.posts), and more.
🤝 Invite collaborators – Find the invitations in the $t(common.space) $t(common.settings).
📚 Need help? Tutorials are available in your $t(common.space) if you chose to include them.

✨ Want more features? Upgrade to Plus or Premium anytime - just contact our team!

whiteboard.text: Card banner showing a preview of {{displayName}} $t(common.whiteboard)
